sub_title: Senior Science lab Technician/ Lab Manager at Amsterdam International Community School
summary:
Working as in charge of Secondary School Science labs (Physics, Chemistry and Biology) in Amsterdam International Community School ,Amsterdam Netherlands and Coordinating and Managing the inventories and Budget for Science Lab at AICS South East School 
Duo qualified Secondary Science (Biology) Teacher
More than 7 years of teaching experience in various schools in India and also working as Primary and Secondary substitute teacher in Amsterdam International Community School, The Netherlands. Also worked in International school of Amsterdam (ISA) as Primary substitute teacher.

I have BSc in Life Sciences with specialization in Biology and MSc in Biomolecular Science with specialization in Cell Biology from Vrije University, Amsterdam. During the master internship program worked extensively on cell culture, stem cell isolation, PCR, RT-PCR, cloning, Immunohistochemistry, genomic & plasmid DNA extraction, transformation, anaerobic culturing, Gel Electrophoresis.

I am a starter in Biomedical Research. While doing my internships I have seen that I am more interested in the practical part of the research, thus I would like to improve and develop my practical skills further working as a Research Analyst. I would like to learn new techniques and technologies which can be used in R&D departments in biotechnological companies or institutes My interests extends in the field of Stem cell Research, Infectious Diseases and Oncology. 

Specialties: Experienced Primary and Secondary Science  teacher , Lab Management
